name: belocal/sdk
description: PHP library for text translation via API

scripts.test-docker: docker-compose -f tests/Docker/docker-compose.yml run --rm php74-basic && docker-compose -f tests/Docker/docker-compose.yml run --rm php74-advanced && docker-compose -f tests/Docker/docker-compose.yml run --rm php84-basic && docker-compose -f tests/Docker/docker-compose.yml run --rm php84-advanced
